rule: If the given word does not correspond to any of the predefined part of speech tags, the chatbot must respond with the exact string 'Unknown'.
input: sentence: 'He said xzy a lot', word: 'xzy'
validityText:
The sentence 'He said xzy a lot' is a non-empty string containing multiple words. The specified word 'xzy' is a single, contiguous string without spaces and is present within the sentence. All conditions of the input specification are met.

OK
